text:
- Rappi is a startup from
Columbia, South America,
The aim is to be a super app.

Right now, Rappi works on
delivering groceries, food,

pretty much anything
that can be delivered.

make us find a partner on
the infrastructure level

that can help us grow at
the speed that we needed.
We use pretty much all the services
that AWS provides on relational databases,

it's Amazon RDS for Postgres,
Amazon RDS for MySQL,

Amazon Aurora for MySQL
and Amazon DocumentDB.

All this means that our customer
have a clean experience.

it's not problematic, we don't
have, we stop having outage,
we stop having problems in performance.

So we don't have a huge
cost on infrastructure,
we can scale up and down pretty easy.
